name: Accordion.Root
description: A collapsible component for displaying content in a vertical stack.
description_zh: A collapsible component for displaying content in a vertical stack.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

collapsible.description: Whether an accordion item can be closed after it has been expanded.
collapsible.description_zh: 折叠面板项在展开后是否可以关闭。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the accordion that are expanded.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the accordion.
defaultValue.description_zh:
展开的折叠面板的初始值。
当您不需要控制折叠式设备的状态时，请使用此选项。

disabled.description: Whether the accordion items are disabled

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the accordion. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 折叠面板中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

modelValue.description:
The accordion items that are currently expanded.
Use this prop to control the state of the items via v-model.
modelValue.description_zh:
当前展开的折叠面板项。
使用 this prop 通过 v-model 控制项目的状态。

multiple.description: Whether multple accordion items can be expanded at the same time.
multiple.description_zh: 是否可以同时扩展多个手风琴项。

orientation.description: The orientation of the accordion items.

events.name: focusChange
events.description: The callback fired when the focused accordion item changes.
events.description_zh: 当焦点折叠项发生更改时触发回调。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: The callback fired when the state of expanded/collapsed accordion items changes.
events.description_zh: 当展开/折叠的折叠折叠项的状态发生变化时触发回调。
